comments:

I can only see this error by physically opening the .log file, as the Error Log
displays a message in red saying it had problems loading the view. (Of all the
views to have an error loading!) It was only through interpreting the stack
trace (parseLargeFile) that I figured the problem had to do with the file size.
Deleting (or otherwise moving/renaming) the log has solved the problem. I've
saved the log, and I'd be happy to attach it to this bug if that would help.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 81440 ***
